title: Autumn Burning Dreadtime Stories for the Wicked Soul
description: Venture forth into the autumn woods and share in the atmosphere of these Halloween tales. From the dark fantastic to the brutal depths of the imagination you’ll find just the classic tone you’re looking for from authors like: Andy Bove, Roy C. Booth, Christina Engela, Dona Fox, Samantha Gregory, Jim Goforth, Sharon L. Higa, Stuart Keane, Axel Kohagen, Michael Noe, Essel Pratt, Samuel Reese, Aghori Shiavite, R. J. Spears, and Brian Woods.
author: Samatha Gregory
